sense.def:
Kadar človek
parries an argument or question
, se trditvi ali vprašanju spretno izogne.

seg.quote: He parried the arguments put to him by saying that he could not comment until the report was published.
Instead of answering he parried with another question.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
parries a blow
, potisne vstran nasprotnikovo roko ali orožje, tako da ga nasprotnik ne poškoduje.
